definitions: Puts a load on or in (a vehicle, ship, or container).
Places a quantity of something, typically a bulk commodity, onto a vehicle or into a container.
Inserts (a film, tape, or disk) into an apparatus.
Transfers (a program or data) into main memory or another storage device.
Prepares (a firearm) for firing by inserting ammunition.
Adds a large amount of something to something else.
examples: He loads the truck with boxes.
She loads the dishwasher every night.
The system loads the data from the server.
